short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension takes you to a random Yelp restaurant in your area!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension takes users to a random Yelp restaurant in their current area with the help of GeoLocation API. Users will be able to find an interesting restaurant to go to easily by using this extension. The extension response time is fast and helps users become more productive.
